V99 Command Line Interface (CLI)
docs.text: V99 CLI is a comprehensive support system for the rapid development of V99 Mini App applications. It enables interaction with mini-app projects or portals through the v99-cli package.

docs.title: V99 Review Tool
docs.text: This tool supports reviewing the source code of the mini-app in ecosystem V99 to detect issues quickly and feedback to the customer. Its uses in the process release a mini app to the app store.

docs.title: V99 Command Line Interface (CLI)
docs.text: V99 CLI is a comprehensive support system for the rapid development of V99 Mini App applications. It enables interaction with mini-app projects or portals through the v99-cli package.

docs.title: login required
docs.text:
npm login --scope=ekkkt-group --auth-type=legacy --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com
How to get an token npm?

Login in portal v99 to get user and password

docs.title: install
docs.text: npm install --location=global @ekkkt-group/v99-cli

docs.title: uninstall
docs.text: npm uninstall --location=global @ekkkt-group/v99-cli

docs.title: Help
docs.text:
Show all v99-cli support commands 

v99-cli --help


v99-cli <command> --help

docs.title: Doctor
docs.text:
Help to check your systems environment to run v99 CLI 

v99-cli doctor

docs.title: Link
docs.text:
Open the browser that logged portal to authorize request login from V99 CLI 

v99-cli link

docs.title: Login
docs.text:
Login by user name and password to get private token + secret key for v99 SDK 

v99-cli login

or type user name, password by command

Short argvLong argv 
v99-cli login -p <password> -u <username>

v99-cli login --password <password> --user <username>

docs.title: Logout
docs.text:
Logout current user 

v99-cli logout

docs.title: Refresh
docs.text:
Refresh user info 

v99-cli refresh

docs.title: App
docs.text: The comand support develop an mini app

docs.title: init
docs.text:
Login by user name and password to get private token + secret key for v99 SDK 

v99-cli app init

or type projectname, version by command

Short argvLong argv 
v99-cli app init -a <ProjectName> -v <X.XX.X>

v99-cli app init --appname <ProjectName> --version <X.XX.X>

docs.title: build
docs.text:
Request Portal to bundle mini app, after that download and load app in the Dev tool

Short argvLong argv 
v99-cli app build -f --release --debug --platform="ios|android"

v99-cli app build --force --release --debug --platform="ios|android"

Default option in command:

Option Default value -f, --force false --release true --debug false --platform ios

docs.title: run
docs.text:
Run a mini app by independence with Dev Tool(run server: http://localhost:8081)

  • run android 
    v99-cli app run --device <device Id> --android
  • run ios 
    v99-cli app run --simulator <simulator name> --ios

docs.title: start
docs.text:
Start a server and gen QR code to load the mini app via dev tool

Short argvLong argv 
v99-cli app start -p <XXXX>

v99-cli app build --port <XXXX>

Default option in command:

Option Default value -p, --port 8181

docs.title: upgrade-version-package
docs.text:
Upgrade the packages to the latest version for the packages supported by the Super app or packages of the ecosystem V99

  • Update package name
Short argvLong argv 
v99-cli app upgrade-version-package -n <packagename>

v99-cli app upgrade-version-package -name <packagename>
  • Update v99 packages 
    v99-cli app upgrade-version-package --v99
  • Update all packages 
    v99-cli app upgrade-version-package --all

docs.title: lint
docs.text:
Double-check the source code of the mini app before requesting to publish the app to the store

v99-cli app lint

docs.title: Danh sách API chưa có:
docs.text: API Name Description Param Response Login with user + pass Hỗ trợ login web portal thông qua cli để lấy npm token và secret key {user: ABC, password: abc} {"id": "id", "name": "user_name", "token_cli": "766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa45654", "npm_name": "npm_name", "npm_token": "token_npm", "template_version": "0.0.4", "template_link": "link_template", "secret_key": "766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa54454"} Get token to login CLI sẽ mở api get token này ở browser ĐÃ LOGIN Portal để lấy token login, user sẽ copy token(cli_token) và input vào cli để login {token_cli: 766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa54454} Verify token login CLI sẽ dùng api này để xác thực lại token login ở trên khi user nhập token để login {cli_token: 766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa54454} {status: success} Refresh Sử dụng để lấy lại thông tin mới nhất như npm token or secret key khi có sự thay đổi {user: ABC , password: ABC, token_cli: 766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa45654} { "cli_token":"766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa45654","npm_name": "npm_name","npm_token": "token npm", "template version": "0.0.4", "template_link": "linktemplate","secret_key":"766cc95d3db269bfe75dc3663aa54454", } Build mini app CLI sẽ dùng api này để request portal build file bundle với mode debug dùng cho dev tool và mode release để submit và publish app {mode: "debug or release"} {status: success}

docs.title: Main features to review source code
Check files are not edited
docs.text:
• metro.config.js
  • react-native.config.js
  • webpack.config.mjs
  • manifest.json
  • src/SDKCommunicator.ts
  • src/ProjectName.tsx

docs.title: Compare manifest
docs.text: Compare manifest file trong proj mini vs server

docs.title: Check project structure
docs.text: Structure: + Check project name + Check required files(manifest.json, package.json, babel.config.js, webpack.config.mjs, SDKCommunicator.ts) + Check file type, must following type as Media(mp3, mpeg, gif, jpg, jpeg, png), code type(js, ts, tsx)

docs.title: Check dependencies
docs.text: Check dependencies in package.json between the current mini app and template: + Check new fields + Check add more, edit dependencies, devDependencies, packageSupport.

docs.title: Check using v99 kit
docs.text:
• Component: V99Button, V99Button, V99Box, V99Text, V99Image, V99Input, V99StyleSheet
  • V99Spacing
  • V99Color

docs.title: Check size
docs.text:
1. Check size the size of build bundles (Max 5Mb)
  2. Check the size of all assets: ".mp3", ".mpeg", ".gif", ".jpg", ".jpeg", ".png" (Max 100Kb)

docs.title: Check source code security
docs.text:
• Using variable window
  • Infinite loop
  • Create a store name same as the super app.
  • Check HTTP link
  • Check white list domain from the server

docs.title: Analyze files
docs.text: Recommenced to convert js to .ts or .tsx, warning file includes strange string (long string(length > 120))

docs.title: Check webpack package and native module using in source code.
Setup flag for all review features in the config file
Check code convention with Eslint if the mini app has Eslint config
docs.text:
• semi: disallows semicolons at the end of statements
  • object-curly-spacing: requires spacing inside of braces
  • array-bracket-spacing: disallows spaces inside array brackets
  • react/require-default-props: ['off']: ensure that any non-required prop types of a component have a corresponding defaultProps value.
  • react/default-props-match-prop-types: ['error']: This rule aims to ensure that any prop in defaultProps has a non-required type definition.
  • react/sort-prop-types: ['error']: This rule checks all components and verifies that all propTypes declarations are sorted alphabetically
  • react-hooks/exhaustive-deps: 'off': rule warns us when we have a missing dependency in an effective hook.
  • no-extra-semi: ['off']: This rule disallows unnecessary semicolons.
  • dot-notation: ['off']: This rule is aimed at maintaining code consistency and improving code readability by encouraging the use of the dot notation style whenever possible

docs.title: Setup git configs
docs.text: Check_standard_manifest_link, mini_template, max_bundle_size_in_mb, max_asset_in_kb, max_string_length.

docs.title: Features 1,2,3,4,10
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js

docs.title: Feature 5
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js + For Component: Add react components that you want to replace by V99 component to tracking_components in the config file * Ex: You want to force TouchableOpacity to V99Button, Please add: tracking_components: { TouchableOpacity: { kitName: "V99Button", isRequire: true }, }, * Note: isRequire is true to show errorLog, else show warningLog + For V99Spacing: set check_v99spacing is true to show errorLog, else skip checking + For V99Color: set check_v99color is true to show errorLog, else skip checking

docs.title: Feature 6
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js + Set maximum bundle size to property max_bundle_size_in_mb to show error log (default 5mb), remove to skip checking

docs.title: Feature 7
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js + Set maximum assets size to property max_asset_in_kb to show error log (default 100kb), remove to skip checking

docs.title: Feature 8
docs.text: Edit the content is not used in the source code at src/rules_template/security_rules.txt

docs.title: Feature 9
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js + Add property analyze_content to check the content file. => Set length you want to check to max_string_length, remove to skip checking => Add force_use_typescript to force use typescript, remove to skip checking

docs.title: Feature 11, 12
docs.text: Edit the rules at: src/config_rule.js

docs.title: Feature 14
docs.text: Edit configs at config.json
